Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry

Class ConnectionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.ConnectionData
  • public class ConnectionData
extends Object
    The class ConnectionData represents the data stored by the reqistry to know for each port on which host the port is published on the RMI registry.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2012-10-22

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConnectionData​(ConnectionType type, String hostname, int port)
      create a connection data object from the information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence strings).
      ConnectionData​(String value)
      create a connection data object from the raw information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence one string).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionData

        public ConnectionData​(ConnectionType type,
                      String hostname,
                      int port)
        create a connection data object from the information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence strings).

        Contract

         pre    hostname != null
 pre    port > 0
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        type - type of connection
        hostname - name of the host on which RMI registry the port is published.
        port - port number of the RMI registry.

      • ConnectionData

        public ConnectionData​(String value)
               throws BadConnectionDataException
        create a connection data object from the raw information received by the registry through a socket communication (hence one string).

        Contract

         pre    value != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        value - string containing the information about the published port.
        Throws:
        BadConnectionDataException - when the conenction data is erroneous.
